GR13uddamt_u:1: Uḍḍāmareśvaratantra, Prathamaḥ paṭalaḥ uḍḍīśena samākīrṇā yogivṛndasamākulā /
GR13uddamt_u:2: praṇamya śirasā devī gaurī pṛcchati śaṃkaram // UT_1.1
GR13uddamt_u:4: prasādaṃ kuru deveśa brūhi dharmārthasādhakam // UT_1.2
GR13uddamt_u:6: śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ vātha karaṇāni bahūni ca // UT_1.3
GR13uddamt_u:8: jñānahāniṃ kriyāhāniṃ kīlakaṃ ca tathāparam // UT_1.4
GR13uddamt_u:10: mantradhyānaṃ viśeṣeṇa tat sarvaṃ vada me prabho // UT_1.5
GR13uddamt_u:11: anyac ca vividhaṃ kāryaṃ prasādād brūhi bhairava /
GR13uddamt_u:12: yasya vijñānamātreṇa manuṣyo bhuvi durlabhaḥ // UT_1.6
GR13uddamt_u:14: śṛṇu tvaṃ hi varārohe siddhyarthaṃ yadi pṛcchasi /
GR13uddamt_u:15: tadvad iṣyāmi te devi tat sarvaṃ samudāhṛtam // UT_1.7
GR13uddamt_u:16: auṣadhair mantrajāpaiś ca ripuṃ hanyān na saṃśayaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:17: uḍḍīśāt sāram ākṛṣya mayoktaṃ tava bhaktitaḥ // UT_1.8
GR13uddamt_u:18: uḍḍīśaṃ ca namaskṛtya rudraṃ caiva sudurlabham /
GR13uddamt_u:21: tais tu prayojitaiḥ saḥ prāṇān hanti na saṃśayaḥ // UT_1.10
GR13uddamt_u:23: tṛtīyaṃ dveṣaṇaṃ cātha turyam uccāṭanaṃ tathā // UT_1.11
GR13uddamt_u:24: grāmoccāṭaṃ pañcamaṃ ca jalastambhaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhakam /
GR13uddamt_u:25: vahneḥ stambhakaraṃ cātha vaśīkaraṇam uttamam // UT_1.12
GR13uddamt_u:26: anyān api prayogāṃś ca bahūn śṛṇu varānane /
GR13uddamt_u:27: śivena kathitā yogā uḍḍīśe śāstraniścaye // UT_1.13
GR13uddamt_u:33: vahner vināśanaṃ kuryāt parṇānāṃ hi vināśanam // UT_1.16
GR13uddamt_u:39: uḍḍīśaṃ yo na jānāti sa ruṣṭaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati // UT_1.19
GR13uddamt_u:40: sumeruṃ cālayet sthānāt sāgaraiḥ plāvayen mahīm /
GR13uddamt_u:41: sūryaṃ ca pātayed bhūmau nedaṃ mithyā bhaviṣyati // UT_1.20
GR13uddamt_u:42: yathaivendrasya vajraṃ ca pāśaṃ hi varuṇasya ca /
GR13uddamt_u:43: yamasya ca yathā daṇḍaṃ kuberasya gadā yathā // UT_1.21
GR13uddamt_u:44: vahneḥ śaktir yathā proktā khaḍgas tu nirṛter yathā /
GR13uddamt_u:45: yathā vāyoś cāṅkuśaṃ hi triśūlaṃ śūlapāṇinaḥ // UT_1.22
GR13uddamt_u:46: skandasya ca yathā śaktir viṣṇoś cakraṃ sudarśanam /
GR13uddamt_u:47: tathaite ca mahāyogāḥ prayuktāḥ śatrukāraṇe // UT_1.23
GR13uddamt_u:51: yenaiva kṛtamātreṇa bhūto gṛhṇāti mānavam // UT_1.25
GR13uddamt_u:55: citāntaḥ saṃsthito bhūtvā yasya gātramṛdāharet // UT_1.27
GR13uddamt_u:57: bhūto gṛhṇāti taṃ śīghraṃ mantreṇānena mantritaḥ // UT_1.28
GR13uddamt_u:58_0: uoṃ namo bhagavate sarvabhūtādhipataye virūpākṣāya nityaṃ krūrāya daṃṣṭriṇe vikarāline
GR13uddamt_u:58_1: grahayakṣabhūtavetālena saha śaṃkara manuṣyaṃ daha daha paca paca gṛhṇa gṛhṇa gṛhṇāpaya
GR13uddamt_u:60: dāpayed devam īśānaṃ ghṛtena vacayā saha // UT_1.29
GR13uddamt_u:62: mantreṇa mantrayitvā tu tataḥ svāsthyaṃ bhavet kila // UT_1.30
GR13uddamt_u:63: mantraḥ uoṃ namaḥ śivāya śāntāya prabhāya muktāya devādhidevāya śubhrabāhave vyādhiṃ śamaya śamaya amukaḥ svastho bhavatu namo 'stu te /
GR13uddamt_u:66: yenaiva kṛtamātreṇa jvaro gṛhṇāti mānavam // UT_1.31
GR13uddamt_u:69: nāma saṃlikhya prakṛtau pācyamānāyāṃ tataḥ param /
GR13uddamt_u:70: tatas tu śatrunāmnā ca aṣṭottaraśataṃ japet // UT_1.33
GR13uddamt_u:72: atha japamantraḥ uoṃ bakāmukhā cāmuṇḍā amukasya kṣīramāṃsaśoṇitabhojinī amukaṃ khaḥ khaḥ jvareṇa gṛhṇa gṛhṇa gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya huṃ phaṭ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:73: pratyānayaṃ yadīccheta tasyaiṣā kriyate kriyā // UT_1.34
GR13uddamt_u:75: athānyat sampravakṣyāmi prayogaṃ bhuvi durlabham // UT_1.35
GR13uddamt_u:77: brahmadaṇḍī citābhasma gomayasya tathaiva ca // UT_1.36
GR13uddamt_u:79: kṣipec chirasi śatrūṇāṃ tūrṇam uccāṭayed ripum // UT_1.37
GR13uddamt_u:81: muṇḍanaṃ cātha keśānāṃ tataḥ svastho bhaved dhruvam // UT_1.38
GR13uddamt_u:83: dhūpaṃ nirbhedakaṃ nāma svayaṃ rudreṇa bhāṣitam // UT_1.39
GR13uddamt_u:85: nirmokaṃ sarparājasya dhūpam uccāṭayed ripūn // UT_1.40
GR13uddamt_u:87: nikhaned yasya ca dvāre tam uccāṭayate haṭhāt // UT_1.41
GR13uddamt_u:90: śatror dvāre nikhātena tūrṇam uccāṭayed ripūn /
GR13uddamt_u:91: saptarātrau deveśi samūlaṃ naśyate gṛham // UT_1.43
GR13uddamt_u:92: atha vidveṣaṇaṃ vakṣye śatrūṇāṃ śṛṇu śaṃkari /
GR13uddamt_u:93: yenaiva kṛtamātreṇa vidveṣo jāyate nṛṇām // UT_1.44
GR13uddamt_u:95: jātīpuṣparasair bhāvyā saptarātraṃ punaḥ punaḥ // UT_1.45
GR13uddamt_u:97: eṣa dhūpaḥ pradātavyaḥ śatrugotrasya madhyataḥ // UT_1.46
GR13uddamt_u:98: yathā gandhaṃ samāghrāti pitā putraiḥ samaṃ kaliḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:99: vidveṣaṇaṃ paraṃ teṣāṃ suhṛdbhir bāndhavaiḥ saha // UT_1.47
GR13uddamt_u:102: surāṃ mānuṣamāṃsaṃ ca samādāya vicakṣaṇaḥ // UT_1.48
GR13uddamt_u:104: saptāhena bhaven māro yathā rudreṇa bhāṣitam // UT_1.49
GR13uddamt_u:106: ariṣṭasya ca pattrāṇi viṣaṃ rudhiram eva ca // UT_1.50
GR13uddamt_u:111: uoṃ namo bhagavate śrīuḍḍāmareśvarāya amukam uccāṭaya uccāṭaya vidveṣaya vidveṣaya svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:113: devam abhyarcya ceśānaṃ śatam aṣṭādhikaṃ japet // UT_1.53
GR13uddamt_u:115: śatrusainye prayoktavyaṃ rājñaś ca vijayārthinaḥ // UT_1.54
GR13uddamt_u:119: amukte hi prayoktavyaṃ sarvaṃ janaśataṃ haret // UT_1.56
GR13uddamt_u:120: nṛkapālaṃ samūtraṃ ca pecakasya śiras tathā /
GR13uddamt_u:121: vṛścikasya tu lāṅgūlaṃ hālāhalakam eva ca // UT_1.57
GR13uddamt_u:124: etāni śoṣayitvā tu kalkaṃ kṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:128: tasya dehe jvaras tīvro bhavet tīvrā ca vedanā // UT_1.60
GR13uddamt_u:130: athānyat sampravakṣyāmi yasya dhyānena sādhanam // UT_1.61
GR13uddamt_u:132: rudhiraṃ kṛṣṇasarpasya kukkuṭasya tu kasyacit // UT_1.62
GR13uddamt_u:134: kuṅkumaṃ bhadramustaṃ ca tagaraṃ kṛṣṇam eva ca // UT_1.63
GR13uddamt_u:136: aśleṣāyāṃ tu piṣṭāni kṛtvā pātre ca rājate // UT_1.64
GR13uddamt_u:137: daśāhaṃ sthāpayed bhūmyāṃ paścād uddhṛtya lepayet /
GR13uddamt_u:138: asidhārāṅgadā nāma svayaṃ rudreṇa bhāṣitā // UT_1.65
GR13uddamt_u:139: athālipet tu gātrāṇi sa kṛtvāsthīny athāpi vā /
GR13uddamt_u:140: phalapuṣpe tathā pattre dhūpasattais tathaiva ca // UT_1.66
GR13uddamt_u:142: anne pāne mantrayitvā prayuñjīta vidhānataḥ // UT_1.67
GR13uddamt_u:143: uoṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya śāntāya divyayogāya divyarūpāya jaṭilabrahmacāriṇe agadokṣitridaśaiva mahābalaśataṃ manohaṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:144: pīḍyamānaṃ japen mantraṃ śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:145: aṣṭottarasahasraṃ tu tato mantram imaṃ japet // UT_1.68
GR13uddamt_u:147: tadaśaktau citāyāṃ tu yathāśakti punaḥ punaḥ // UT_1.69
GR13uddamt_u:151: abhukte naiva prokta yaṃ krūre pāpajane tathā // UT_1.71
GR13uddamt_u:153: iti pārvatīśivasaṃvāde vīrabhadreśvaratantroddhṛte uḍḍāmareśvaramahātantre prathamaḥ paṭalaḥ Uḍḍāmareśvaratantra, Dvitīyaḥ paṭalaḥ athānyat sampravakṣyāmi jalastambhanam uttamam /
GR13uddamt_u:154: kumbhīravelvadaṃṣṭrāni rudhiraṃ māṃsam eva ca // UT_2.1
GR13uddamt_u:156: vibhītakasya tailena sarvān ekatra kārayet // UT_2.2
GR13uddamt_u:157: nyāsakarma tataḥ kṛtvā jale tiṣṭhed yathāsukham /
GR13uddamt_u:158: madrakasya rasaṃ grāhyaṃ lakṣaṇasya makarasya ca // UT_2.3
GR13uddamt_u:159: ḍuṇḍubhasya śiro grāhyaṃ sarvān ekatra kārayet /
GR13uddamt_u:160: vibhītakasya taile tu pacyamāne ca dāpayet // UT_2.4
GR13uddamt_u:162: tat tailaṃ pācayet lauhe kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ samāhitaḥ // UT_2.5
GR13uddamt_u:166: anena mantrayitvā tu tataḥ sidhyati nānyathā // UT_2.7
GR13uddamt_u:167: uoṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya jalaṃ stambhaya stambhaya huṃ phaṭ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:169: bhallātakarasaṃ guñjā viṣaṃ citrakam eva ca // UT_2.8
GR13uddamt_u:172: tasya rūpaṃ pravakṣyāmi jāyate yas tu lakṣaṇaiḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:173: aṅgāni dhūmam āyānti mūrchayanti muhur muhuḥ // UT_2.10
GR13uddamt_u:175: cikitsāṃ tasya vakṣyāmi yena sampadyate sukham // UT_2.11
GR13uddamt_u:178: uoṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya kuhalīkurvanī svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:180: kṛṣṇasarpaśiro grāhyaṃ mukhe niḥkṣipya sarṣapān // UT_2.13
GR13uddamt_u:182: valmīkasya mṛdaḥ kośe antardhūmena pācayet // UT_2.14
GR13uddamt_u:184: viṣasya cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tu śatrūṇāṃ mūrdhni niḥkṣipet // UT_2.15
GR13uddamt_u:186: prasvinne ca tato gātre lagnās tasmiṃs tu sarṣapāḥ // UT_2.16
GR13uddamt_u:187: lūtāṃ ca saviṣāṃ kuryān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GR13uddamt_u:190: atha śasyavināśaṃ ca kathayāmi samāsataḥ // UT_2.18
GR13uddamt_u:192: kṣetre sampātayed yasmiṃs tasmiñ śasyavināśanam // UT_2.19
GR13uddamt_u:193: māhendreṇa kṣipet tatra prayogeṇa tu mantravit /
GR13uddamt_u:194: atha mantraṃ punar vakṣye prayogeṣu prayojakam // UT_2.20
GR13uddamt_u:196: uoṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya vajraṃ vināśaya vajraṃ surapatir ājñāpaya huṃ phaṭ svāhā
GR13uddamt_u:198: parṇānāṃ caiva yogena kṣipet parṇaṃ vinaśyati // UT_2.21
GR13uddamt_u:199: punar uccāṭanaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu putra yathātathā /
GR13uddamt_u:201: grāme caturṇāṃ ca pathāṃ mṛdam ādāya buddhimān /
GR13uddamt_u:202: gomayenākṛtiṃ kṛtvā grāmasya ca caturdiśaḥ // UT_2.23
GR13uddamt_u:204: hutvā cāhutisāhasraṃ tato bhasma samāharet // UT_2.24
GR13uddamt_u:207_0: uoṃ namo bhagavate mahākālarudrāya tripuravināśanakāraṇāya daha daha dhama dhama
GR13uddamt_u:207_1: paca paca matha matha mohaya mohaya unmādaya unmādaya ucchedaya ucchedaya śrīmahārudra
GR13uddamt_u:207_2: ājñāpayati śabdakarī mohinī bhagavatī kheṃ kheṃ huṃ phaṭ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:208: grāme vā nagare vāpi bhasmaprakṣepaṇena ca /

GR13uddamt_u:210: dūrīkṛtaṃ punar bhasma nagare vasate punaḥ /

GR13uddamt_u:214: vṛṣabhasya punaḥ śatroḥ kṛtvā caivākṛtiṃ budhaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:217: uoṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya kāmaprabhañjanāya amukaṃ cchaḥ cchaḥ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:218: prasthitānāṃ ca karaṇe mantreṇānena mantravit // UT_2.30
GR13uddamt_u:219: kṛtvā madhu ghṛtāktaṃ ca sthāne hy atra prayojayet /
GR13uddamt_u:220: snātvā ca gavyadugdhena tataḥ svastho bhaviṣyati // UT_2.31
GR13uddamt_u:223: gṛhacaṭakasya viṣṭā ca tathā karañjabījakam // UT_2.32
GR13uddamt_u:224: etad unmattakaraṃ cūrṇaṃ bhakṣaṇāt tatkaraṃ vrajet /
GR13uddamt_u:226: khāne pāne pradātavyam unmattaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:227: uoṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya amukam unmādaya unmādaya cchaḥ cchaḥ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:228: ajakṣīreṇa śoṇitena pibet tu śatapuṣpikām // UT_2.34
GR13uddamt_u:229: ghṛtena saha vā pītvā tataḥ sampadyate sukham /
GR13uddamt_u:231: ekaviṃśativāraṃ hi mantritaṃ lavaṇaṃ kharam // UT_2.35
GR13uddamt_u:233: lavaṇaṃ tantu saṃgṛhya cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā vicakṣaṇaḥ // UT_2.36
GR13uddamt_u:235: mantritaṃ śatavāraṃ ca śatror vā yasya kasyacit // UT_2.37
GR13uddamt_u:236: bhakṣaṇāc ca bhaved andho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GR13uddamt_u:237: uoṃ nama uḍḍāmareśvarāya śarīram andhaṃ kuru ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:242: saptāhāj jāyate kuṣṭhaṃ tatpītaṃ ca samedhitam // UT_2.40
GR13uddamt_u:243: etasya śamanaṃ kuryād yathā rudreṇa bhāṣitam /
GR13uddamt_u:246: śālibhaktaṃ paṭolaṃ ca ghṛtayuktaṃ tu pāyasam // UT_2.42
GR13uddamt_u:247: soṣṇaṃ vā mudgacūrṇaṃ tu śāliyuktam athāpi vā /
GR13uddamt_u:248: etena dattamātreṇa naraḥ sampadyate sukham // UT_2.43
GR13uddamt_u:249: jalajīvaṃ tu saṃgṛhya śoṣayed ātape naraḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:250: tasya saṃdāpayed dhīmān yasya icchet tu jīvitam // UT_2.44
GR13uddamt_u:252: yadīcchej jīvitaṃ tasya aṅgaṃ prakṣālayed dhruvam // UT_2.45
GR13uddamt_u:253: padamūlasya cūrṇaṃ tu kṣālayet kāñjikena tu /
GR13uddamt_u:258: purāṇikasya hṛdayaṃ tathā kuṣṭhena bhāvitam // UT_2.48
GR13uddamt_u:260: niyataṃ kiṃkaro bhūtvā yāvaj jīvaṃ sa tiṣṭhati // UT_2.49
GR13uddamt_u:262: uoṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya svādhikāraṃ sādhaya sādhaya svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:265: chāyāyāṃ vaṭikā kāryā pradeyā khānapānataḥ // UT_2.51
GR13uddamt_u:266: puruṣaṃ cātha vā narīṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ vaśaṃ nayet /
GR13uddamt_u:267: saptāhaṃ mantritaṃ kṛtvā mantreṇānena mantravit // UT_2.52
GR13uddamt_u:268: uoṃ namo bhagavate mohamāline ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:270: śvetā ca girikarṇī ca samaṃ saptāhabhāvitāḥ // UT_2.53
GR13uddamt_u:272: taṃ vaśīkaraṇaṃ proktaṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // UT_2.54
GR13uddamt_u:274: divyaṃ vacā viśālākṣā kambugrīvā suśobhanā // UT_2.55
GR13uddamt_u:276: dadāti daśamīnā ca mantraḥ kaścit pragṛhyate // UT_2.56
GR13uddamt_u:278: jalamadhye sahā cauraṃ kurute vartiko mama // UT_2.57
GR13uddamt_u:279: dadhi madhu navanītaṃ pippalī śṛṅgaveraṃ maricam api tu dadyāt saptamaṃ saindhavena /
GR13uddamt_u:280: yadi bhavati saroṣaṃ takṣakeṇāpi daṣṭaṃ gadam iha khalu pītvā nirviṣaṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ syāt // UT_2.58
GR13uddamt_u:284: biḍālasya varāhasya kākabhekasya ca tvacaḥ // UT_2.60
GR13uddamt_u:285: mūṣakasya tu netraṃ ca sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet /
GR13uddamt_u:286: anenāñjitanetro hi rātrau paśyed yathā divā // UT_2.61
GR13uddamt_u:288: uoṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya śivāya jyotiṣāṃ pataye dehi jyotīṃṣi mativīryakaraṇāya svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:291: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi sthitvā śatam aṣṭottaraṃ japet // UT_2.63
GR13uddamt_u:293: uoṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya añjanamantrasiddhiṃ dehi me svāhā ity añjanādhikāraḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:295: kanakasya ca bījāni priyaṅgu guggulas tathā // UT_2.64
GR13uddamt_u:297: yogam imaṃ samāghrāti sa vaśyo jāyate bhṛśam // UT_2.65
GR13uddamt_u:299: kuṣṭhaṃ ca devadāruṃ ca sarvam ekīkṛtaṃ tathā // UT_2.66
GR13uddamt_u:301: yatra yatra praviṣṭas tu tatra tatra jayī bhavet // UT_2.67
GR13uddamt_u:302: Uḍḍāmareśvaratantra, Tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ kākasya pakṣau saṃgṛhya sarpakañcukam eva ca /
GR13uddamt_u:306: yenaiva jñātamātreṇa śatravo yānti vaśyatām // UT_3.2
GR13uddamt_u:307: śatruniryāsaṃ saṃgṛhya cūrṇaṃ sattvaṃ ca tasya vai /
GR13uddamt_u:308: bhāvayet saptarātraṃ tu bhojanaiḥ saha dāpayet // UT_3.3
GR13uddamt_u:309: dattamātreṇa tenaiva piśācair gṛhyate tu saḥ /

GR13uddamt_u:312: bhāvayet saptarātraṃ tu bhojanaiḥ saha dīyate // UT_3.5
GR13uddamt_u:315: vāstukasya tu niryāsaṃ bījāni katakasya ca /
GR13uddamt_u:319: bhāvayet saptarātraṃ tu bhakṣye pāne pradāpayet /
GR13uddamt_u:320: uoṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya maheśvaro nāma svāhā /

GR13uddamt_u:324: cūrṇīkṛtais tac cūrṇaṃ tu dugdhena saha dāpayet /

GR13uddamt_u:328: uoṃ hrīṃ kālī kaṅkālī kila kila svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:330: tataḥ sahasraṃ juhuyāt kaṅkālī varadā bhavati suvarṇamāṣacatuṣṭayaṃ pratyahaṃ dadāti /
GR13uddamt_u:331: atha sarvajanamukhastambhanam antaḥ uoṃ hrīṃ namo bhagavatī durvacatī kili vācābhañjanī sarvajanamukhastambhinī hrāṃ hrīṃ hraiṃ hrauṃ hraḥ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:332: anena mantreṇa bilvamaricaṃ ghṛtāktaṃ sahasrahavanaṃ kuryāt samastajanapadāḥ kiṃkarā bhavanti

GR13uddamt_u:335: anena mantreṇa sahasrajaptena kavitvaṃ karoti nātra saṃdehaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:336: uoṃ uoṃ uoṃ īṃ īṃ īṃ aiṃ aiṃ aiṃ namaḥ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:337: anena mantreṇa daśasahasrajaptena kavitvaṃ karoti // UT_4.2
GR13uddamt_u:338: Uḍḍāmareśvaratantra, Pañcamaḥ paṭalaḥ śṛṇu putra pravakṣyāmi yathā trailokyamohanam /

GR13uddamt_u:340: elā kuṣṭhaṃ ca lodhraṃ ca vacā ca raktacandanam /

GR13uddamt_u:345: saptarātre sthite pātre tailam ebhiḥ paced budhaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:346: tailena bhagam ālipya bhartāram upagacchati // UT_5.4
GR13uddamt_u:347: samprāpya maithunaṃ bhartā dāso bhavati nānyathā /
GR13uddamt_u:348: nāgaraiḥ madhusaṃyuktair guṭikāṃ kārayed budhaḥ // UT_5.5
GR13uddamt_u:350: kuṅkumaṃ śatapuṣpaṃ ca priyaṅgu rocanaṃ tataḥ // UT_5.6
GR13uddamt_u:351: ajākṣīreṇa dātavyaṃ yā bhāryā durbhagā bhavet /
GR13uddamt_u:352: tataḥ sā subhagā nityaṃ patidāsatvam āpnuyāt // UT_5.7
GR13uddamt_u:354: samudrajaṃ raktacūrṇaṃ madhunā saha lepayet // UT_5.8
GR13uddamt_u:356: adhunā sampravakṣyāmi yogānāṃ sāram uttamam // UT_5.9
GR13uddamt_u:358: uśīraṃ candanaṃ caiva madhunā saha saṃyutam // UT_5.10
GR13uddamt_u:360: kevalaṃ śaśinā yuktaṃ kuṅkumaṃ lepayed bhage // UT_5.11
GR13uddamt_u:362: lavaṃgaṃ saindhavaṃ kṣaudraṃ pippalī maricāni ca // UT_5.12
GR13uddamt_u:363: narasya lepayed gātraṃ sa bhaved gajahastavat /
GR13uddamt_u:365: tenaiva liptamātreṇa bhage randhro na jāyate /
GR13uddamt_u:368: vāmapādaṃ striyo limpet sā tasya vaśagā bhavet // UT_5.15
GR13uddamt_u:369: yā bhogaśeṣe kāntasya liṅgaṃ vāmāṅghriṇā spṛśet /
GR13uddamt_u:370: yāvad āyur bhaved dāsaḥ sa tasyā nātra saṃśayaḥ // UT_5.16
GR13uddamt_u:372: liptvā liṅgaṃ bhajed yāṃ tu sā vaśyā syād varāṅganā // UT_5.17
GR13uddamt_u:373: ghanasāraṃ satallavyaṃ meḍhraṃ ca madhunā saha /
GR13uddamt_u:374: piṣṭvā liptvā rajo yāṃ ca bhajet sā vaśyagā bhavet // UT_5.18
GR13uddamt_u:376: ebhir viliptaliṅgo yāṃ bhajate sā vaśā bhavet // UT_5.19
GR13uddamt_u:377_1: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā śanibhaumayor vāre 'śleṣānakṣatre ārdrānakṣatre
GR13uddamt_u:377_2: vā samabhāgāni kṛtvā kūpataḍāganadīpayasā peṣayitvā guṭikāṃ kṛtvā saṃgrāme copaviśet /
GR13uddamt_u:379: athānantaraṃ ye 'nye puruṣā darśanaṃ kurvanti te kampayanti mūrchayanti

GR13uddamt_u:382: eṣa yogo mayā prokto devānām api durlabhaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:383: nivedanīyaḥ kasyāpi na kadācid iti bruve // UT_6.1
GR13uddamt_u:385: yena vijñānamātreṇa jāyate ca śubhāśubham // UT_6.2
GR13uddamt_u:389: atha pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśāni tattvāni tatra guror bṛhatprasādena śāstrāṇi ca yena yogenātītena trailokyaṃ sacarācaraṃ jātam eva /
GR13uddamt_u:391: sa ca sampretya ceṣṭāyāṃ lakṣyate tasyāḥ kiṃ nāma tasya ca kā jijñāsā yathāpad ucyate cāhus tataḥ pañcatattvāni paṭhyante /
GR13uddamt_u:392: samprati dūto yad āgatya vadati tasya vāg udeti pañcatattvākṣarāṇi jñātvā yasya tattvākṣarasya vaktre tattvākṣarāṇi bhavanti praśnacintāyāṃ sa tattvaṃ japati /
GR13uddamt_u:393: yadi praśnacintāyāṃ pṛthivītattvākṣarāṇi bhavanti tadā pṛthvītattvaṃ bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:394: yady eṣām adhikā bhavanti tadā pānīyatattvāni bhavanti tattvākṣarāṇīty arthaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:402: jīvitamaraṇalābhālābhajayaparājayasukhaduḥkhagamanāgamanāni ca yāni samāni viṣamāṇi aptattvāni nirvācitavyāni /
GR13uddamt_u:403: yadā cittaṃ bhavati kṛtasya vākyaviṣaye pṛthivīviṣaye tadā salilatattvākṣarāṇi bhavanti tadā sa japtaṃ japati /
GR13uddamt_u:404: apcintāyāṃ yadā pṛthivītattvākṣarāṇi bhavanti tadā pṛthvītattvaṃ bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:407: lābhacintāyāṃ tejākāśākṣarāṇi adhikāni bhavanti tadā te 'śubho 'dhikataro
GR13uddamt_u:409: yadā deśāt tattvād vā gamanādikaṃ tejasaḥ grāmacalite saṃgrāmagamane ahetu ake ḍake taijasākṣarāṇy adhikāni bhavanti /
GR13uddamt_u:410: pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśā eteṣām akṣarāṇi vivāhakāle eteṣu tejo'kṣarāṇi
GR13uddamt_u:414: yasyāḥ prayogamātreṇa devatā yānti vaśyatām // UT_7.1
GR13uddamt_u:415: oṣadhī sā budhaiḥ proktā cāṇḍālī lokaviśrutā /
GR13uddamt_u:420: ekapattrī tu svāṅgamalasaṃyuktā striyaṃ vaśam ānayati dvipattrī rājño rājapuruṣān /
GR13uddamt_u:421: tripattrī śrīśākamaricasahitā duṣṭāṃ camūṃ vaśam ānayati catuṣpattrī ca kandusahitā mattaduṣṭagajaṃ vaśam ānayati /
GR13uddamt_u:422_0: athotpāṭanavidhiḥ kathyate śanivāre śucir bhūtvā sāyaṃ saṃdhyādikaṃ vidhāya gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpanaivedyādibhiḥ
GR13uddamt_u:422_1: pañcopacāraiḥ pūjādikaṃ vidhāya akṣataṃ phalaṃ haste gṛhītvā oṣadhisamīpe sthitvābhimantraṇaṃ
GR13uddamt_u:424: tatra mantraḥ yena tvāṃ khanate brahmā hṛṣīkeśo maheśvaraḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:426: tena tvāṃ khanayiṣyāmi tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mahauṣadhi /
GR13uddamt_u:428: śucir ārabhya ekānte prabhāte mantramuktitaḥ // UT_7.4
GR13uddamt_u:429: saṃgrāhyam auṣadhaṃ siddhyai na bhavanti hi kāṣṭhavat /
GR13uddamt_u:431: balam āyuś ca me dehi pāpaṃ me naya dūrataḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:432: yena cānena mantreṇa khanitvotpāṭyamānaṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pūrvam ānīto yo 'nyathā
GR13uddamt_u:434: atraiva tiṣṭha kalyāṇi mama kārśyakarī bhava // UT_7.6
GR13uddamt_u:435: mama kārye kṛte siddhe itas tvaṃ hi gamiṣyasi /
GR13uddamt_u:436: uoṃ hīṃ raktacāmuṇḍe hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:437_0: anena mantreṇa puṣyarkṣe hastarkṣe vā nakṣatre sarvāś cauṣadhya utpāṭanīyā yair naraiś
GR13uddamt_u:437_1: ca udite bhānau oṣadhyaḥ khanyante utpāṭyante utpadyante vā tāsāṃ ravikiraṇapītaprabhāvenāvīryaprabhāvo
GR13uddamt_u:439: yady udite bhāskare utpāṭyante tadā tāsāṃ pūjā kartavyā /
GR13uddamt_u:440: japāraktotpalaraktakaravīraraktacandanakuṅkumena gavyagomayena sapādahastabhūmiṃ saṃlipya tanmadhye caturasraṃ kārayet /
GR13uddamt_u:441: raktacandanakuṅkumābhyāṃ tanmadhye vartulaṃ vitastimātraṃ bhānuṃ pūjayet /
GR13uddamt_u:444: uoṃ drāṃ drīṃ drūṃ draiṃ drauṃ draḥ saḥ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:445: anena mantreṇa pūjāṃ kṛtvotpāṭayed vīryayuktā bhavati sarvakāryakṣamā bhavati // UT_7.7
GR13uddamt_u:446: Uḍḍāmareśvaratantra, Aṣṭamaḥ paṭalaḥ athānyat sampravakṣyāmi nārīṇāṃ garbhadhāraṇam /
GR13uddamt_u:447: padmabījaṃ gavyapayasā saha yā narī pibati sā garbhavatī bhavati satyam eva ādityavāre nimantrayet candravāre bhakṣayet /
GR13uddamt_u:448: pūrvadigbhāgasthitaṃ śarīṣamūlaṃ gavyaghṛtena saha ṛtusamaye bhakṣayet sā saṃvatsareṇa garbhavatī bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:449: anapatyā ca yā narī kapitthaṃ bhakṣayet sadā /
GR13uddamt_u:450: abhimantrya tu mantreṇa sāpi putravatī bhavet // UT_8.1
GR13uddamt_u:452: ādivandhyāpi deveśi bhaved garbhavatī hi sā // UT_8.2
GR13uddamt_u:453: devaḥ śivo bhaved yatra nadīsaṅgam asaṃnidhau /
GR13uddamt_u:454: tasyāṃ nadyāṃ diśi svāhā vandhyā putravatī bhavet // UT_8.3
GR13uddamt_u:455: vidhir atrocyate kapilāgomayenātha bhūmiṃ saṃlipya yatnataḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:456: snātvā vidhiprakāreṇa maṇḍalaṃ kārayet tataḥ // UT_8.4
GR13uddamt_u:458: tanmadhye vilikhet paścād aṣṭapattraṃ sakarṇikam // UT_8.5
GR13uddamt_u:459: madhye tu pūjayed devaṃ pattre śaktiṃ prapūjayet /
GR13uddamt_u:463_1: samudrāḥ saritaḥ sarvāḥ sarvauṣadhayaḥ sarvadevatāḥ sarvasiddhayaḥ sarvayoginyaḥ
GR13uddamt_u:463_2: sarve girayaḥ sarve nāgāḥ pañcajātyāni phalāni pañcaprakārākṣatāni pañca suvarṇapuṣpāṇi
GR13uddamt_u:464: atha mantraḥ kṣaṃ kṣīṃ kṣūṃ kṣaiṃ kṣauṃ kṣaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:465: anena mantreṇa yā narī vidhānena niratavarjitā abrahmacāriṇī devī vandhyā pañcapativarjitā
GR13uddamt_u:466: aputrā labhate putrān durbhagā subhagā bhavet /
GR13uddamt_u:467: anenaiva vidhānena kanyā prāpnoti satpatim // UT_8.7
GR13uddamt_u:469: navābhicāritāḥ kūrāḥ śuddhadehā bhavanti te // UT_8.8
GR13uddamt_u:470: ye cānye vighnakartāraś caranti bhuvi rākṣasāḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:471: te sarve pralayaṃ yānti satyaṃ devi mayoditam // UT_8.9
GR13uddamt_u:473: brahmahatyādayo doṣāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ // UT_8.10
GR13uddamt_u:474: atha prathamopāya ucyate nāgakesara 10 māṣakaṃ gavyaghṛtena sahartusnānadivase pibet /
GR13uddamt_u:475: tadanantaraṃ bhartrā saha rātrau saṃyogaṃ kuryāt /
GR13uddamt_u:477: atha dvitīyopāyaḥ śvetajīrakam 17 māṣamātrakaṃ rātrau mṛnmayapātre jalena saha nirāvaraṇasthāne samagrarātrau sthāpayet /
GR13uddamt_u:478: agnimadivase śilāyāṃ piṣṭvā paryuṣitajalena yā strī ṛtusnānadine pītvā rātrau bhartrā saha saṃyogaṃ kuryād avaśyaṃ sā garbhavatī bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:479: atha tṛtīyopāya dakālvadmadīpi 10 māṣakaṃ gavyadugdhena saha yā ṛtusnānadivase pītvā rātrau bhartrā saha saṃyogaṃ kuryāt sā avaśyam eva garbhavatī bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:481: uoṃ ghaṇṭākarṇāya svāhā imaṃ saptadhā japtvā grāme nagare vā praviśet tatra viśiṣṭaṃ bhojanaṃ prāpnoti /
GR13uddamt_u:482: anyac ca bho alla me siddhā anenāṣṭottaraśataṃ japet /
GR13uddamt_u:483: śirīṣamūlamṛdaḥ kṣetrasya catuṣkoṇeṣu mokṣayet tadā śaśakamūṣakavarāhacatuṣpādaprabhṛtīnāṃ mukhabandhanaṃ bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:487: mantrākṣarāṇi likhitvā sādhakasya tasya yadāpi ca prathamavargākṣaro bhavati tadā mitraṃ dvitīyavargākṣaro bhavati tadā siddhaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:488: tṛtīyavargasya yadā bhavati tadā sādhyaḥ caturthavargākṣaro bhavati tadodāsīnaḥ pañcamavargākṣaro yadā bhavati tadā śatrur jñātavyaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:489: etān bhedān jñātvā mantraśodhanam ārabhet tadā sādhakānāṃ sukhāvaho bhavati atha kalpavṛkṣaṣaṇḍamūlāni yāni prakṣālitāni gavyadadhimiśritāyāṃ rājikāyāṃ saṃskāryāṇi /
GR13uddamt_u:493: atha mantraḥ uoṃ namaḥ ṣaṇmukhāya śaktihastāya mayūravāhanāya auṣadhīkena dehi me bhava svāhā
GR13uddamt_u:494: anena mantreṇa caturdaśyāṃ śucir bhūtvā mayūraśikhām utpāṭayet tadā mahāprabhāvayuktā bhavati
GR13uddamt_u:495: gavyaghṛtena saha saṃgṛhyeta tadā indriyabalo bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:497: anyac ca śvetakaravīramūlaśvetagirikarṇikāmūlahevacanāṅbhīkṛtajātāñjalī pañcamalasamāyuktā khāne pāne pradātavyā maraṇāntaṃ vaśīkaraṇam // UT_8.12
GR13uddamt_u:498_0: anyac ca śvetagirikarṇikāmūlaṃ svavīryeṇa saha svakīyapañcamalaharavīryaśvetārkamūlam
GR13uddamt_u:498_1: etāni hastarkṣe puṣyarkṣe vā ekīkṛtya kumārikāhastābhyāṃ mardayitvā aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ
GR13uddamt_u:498_2: vā gajamadena saha haste guṭikāṃ kārayet /
GR13uddamt_u:499: yasyai ekāpi dīyate sā vaśyā bhavati nānyathā /
GR13uddamt_u:500: śuklapakṣe 'pi sarpāṇāṃ dīyate te sarpā api vaśyā bhavanti śrīmahābhairavasya vaco yathā kuṅkumena saha dīyate tadā vai gajo vaśībhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:501: rocanayā kuṅkumena saha yadā tilakaṃ kriyate tadā sā strī pṛṣṭhalagnā bhramati /
GR13uddamt_u:503: rājadvāre tathā nyāye vivāhe yuddhe jayāvahe trailokyamohanam etat /
GR13uddamt_u:504: triphalā 5 māṣāḥ nimba 1 māṣa kadamba 2 māṣa nīpa 3 māṣa tirāitā 4 māṣa karañja 5 māṣa bhṛṅgarāja 6 māṣa mayūraśikhā 7 māṣāḥ etāni samabhāgāni
GR13uddamt_u:507: bhojanaṃ ca yathāhāraṃ kurute nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:509: rātricūrṇaṃ śirīṣavalkalacūrṇaṃ ca gavyaghṛtena saha yasyai vanitāyai ṛtusnānadivase pānārthaṃ dīyate sā strī vandhyāpi garbhavatī bhavati nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:510: etac cūrṇaṃ kapitthaphalena saha ṛtusamaye aputravatī bhakṣayati sā strī putram āpnoti /
GR13uddamt_u:511: etac cūrṇaṃ śvetakaṅkolīmūlaṃ lakṣmaṇācūrṇaṃ ca samaṃ kṛtvā kuṅkumakvāthena sahartusamaye sadā bhakṣaṇārthaṃ dīyate tadā tasyāḥ śarīraśuddhir bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:512_0: paścād ṛtusamayopari pañca dināni bhakṣayet tadā sā garbhadhāraṇakṣamā bhavati nātra
GR13uddamt_u:512_1: saṃśayaḥ Uḍḍāmareśvaratantra, Navamaḥ paṭalaḥ athānyat sampravakṣyāmi auṣadhaṃ paramadurlabham /
GR13uddamt_u:513: āsphoṭī nāma vikhyātā nāgadamanīti viśrutā // UT_9.1
GR13uddamt_u:515: viṣāḥ sarve vinaśyanti lepanād bhakṣaṇāt kṣaṇāt // UT_9.2
GR13uddamt_u:516: pattrahaste tāṃ pralipya sarpo dhriyate dhṛtamātre sarpo na naśyati naiva kṣatāni pralipya nāgapūjitamantreṇa sarpo vinaśyati /
GR13uddamt_u:517: nāgadamanīmūlaṃ khananān nāḍīlalāṭalepanān nāśayati samantataḥ āmavātaṃ pittavātaṃ śleṣmavātam ete vātā vinaśyanti bhakṣaṇān nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:519: putramaya vaśīkaraṇakārakaputraputraṃ kaṃsaṃ kātarāpi vaśaṃ paraṃ mahilājanasyaikaśa apy asya dīyate sā patiṃ parityajya paśyatāṃ lokānāṃ nagnā bhūtvā bhramati /
GR13uddamt_u:521: tāmravedīparora iti lokair ucyate śanivāre tām abhimantrya digambaro muktakeśo bhūtvānudite bhānau grahaṇaṃ kuryāt /

GR13uddamt_u:1093_1: bhavati oṃ hrīṃ amukaṃ chaḥ chaḥ anena mantreṇa mānuṣyāsthimayaṃ kīlakam ekādaśāṅgulaṃ
GR13uddamt_u:1093_2: sahasreṇābhimantritaṃ yasya gṛhe nikhanet tasya kūṭaṃ cotsādanaṃ bhavati uddhṛte
GR13uddamt_u:1094: oṃ hrīṃ kāla kaṅkāla mahākāla karālavadana amukaṃ gṛhṇa triśūlena bhinddhi
GR13uddamt_u:1095: 2 khaḍgena chinddhi 2 huṃ phaṭ chaḥ chaḥ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:1096: anena mantreṇa vibhītakakāṣṭhakīlakam ekaviṃśatyaṅgulaṃ sahasreṇābhimantritaṃ yasya gṛhadvāre nikhanyate tasya sadyo dehanipātanaṃ bhavati // UT_14.24
GR13uddamt_u:1097: oṃ hrīṃ klīṃ śrīṃ huṃ amukaṃ chaḥ chaḥ /
GR13uddamt_u:1098: anena mantreṇa siddhikāṣṭhamayaṃ kīlakaṃ navāṅgulaṃ sahasreṇābhimantritaṃ yasya gṛhe nikhanyate sa vaśyo bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:1099: oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ klīṃ mātaṃgini aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ klīṃ svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:1100: anena mantreṇa rājikāṃ lavaṇaghṛtamiśritāṃ yasya nāmnā saha homayet tāṃ striyaṃ puruṣaṃ vā vaśayaty ākarṣaṇaṃ ca karoti // UT_14.25
GR13uddamt_u:1102: anena mantreṇa vāḍavakāṣṭhamayaṃ kīlakaṃ trayodaśāṅgulaṃ sahasreṇābhimantritaṃ yasya gṛhe nikhanet sa cakṣurbhyām andho bhavati //
GR13uddamt_u:1104: anena mantreṇa bilvakāṣṭhasya kīlakaṃ daśāṅgulaṃ sahasreṇābhimantritaṃ yasya gṛhe nikhanet saparivārasya tasya pretatvaṃ bhavati // UT_14.27
GR13uddamt_u:1105: oṃ hrīṃ amukīṃ me prayaccha svāhā /
GR13uddamt_u:1106: anena mantreṇa pāṭalākāṣṭhamayaṃ pañcāṅgulaṃ kīlakaṃ sahasreṇābhimantritaṃ yasya nāmnā devatāyatane nikhanet sa śīghraṃ kanyāṃ labhate // UT_14.28
GR13uddamt_u:1107: Uḍḍāmareśvaratantra, Pañcadaśaḥ paṭalaḥ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ yantraṃ likhitvā tatra ṣaṭkoṇe oṃ kurukulle svāhā iti mantraṃ pūrvakoṇe likhet /
GR13uddamt_u:1110: tato bhūrjapattre imaṃ mantraṃ likhitvā gṛhadvāre dehalyā ekadeśe dhṛte sati gṛhasarpam uccāṭayati vivaradvāri dhṛte vivarastho naśyaty eva //
GR13uddamt_u:1111: raktakaravīrapuṣpam āmrapattrabhasmanā liptaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva śubhraṃ bhavati tathā gandhakadhūpenāpi bhāvitena śuktir bhavati /
GR13uddamt_u:1112: loke hayamāra ityākhyasya raktakaravīrasya puṣpaṃ tūlavartikāgandhakena saha saṃyojya tatkṣaṇād eva jvalati /
GR13uddamt_u:1113: tathā ṭaṅkanaharidrābhyāṃ kṛte lepe kuṅkumakāntir bhavati // UT_15.2
GR13uddamt_u:1114: purāṇaśuṣkagomayaṃ yadā jale pātayet tadā bhīmoṣmaṇā tasmād budbudam utpadyate /
GR13uddamt_u:1115: evaṃ gauraṃ tu bhūmyupari bhūtalaṃ spṛṣṭvā raktakaravīravṛkṣo jāyate iti /
GR13uddamt_u:1116: rūpake tāmre bhramara iva kumbhe samarpayet kiṃcid anuyogitvena mano'nurāgo bhavati tāmbūlarāgataḥ naśyati haridrārāgo ravikiraṇāt //
GR13uddamt_u:1117_0: oṃ huṃ sati kurur upakṣiśabdataḥ kuralakuṅkumena iti prasiddhiḥ kroñca ity api tasya
GR13uddamt_u:1117_2: punar api karatalalagnāt pradarśya gatyāścaryamate śiśudugdhabhāvitāt śodhayitvā
GR13uddamt_u:1117_3: gavādidugdhaṃ coṣṇaṃ kāṃsyapātre kṛtvā tīkṣṇataraṃ dhṛtvā taṇḍulanikṣepaṇena kṣīraṃ
GR13uddamt_u:1118: bhūrjapattrapuṭakaṃ tilatailena dīpayitvā vividhabhakṣyānnaṃ sādhayet yathā lauhabhājane sādhyate
GR13uddamt_u:1119: vārtākarañjikāpalam iti tat sūtreṇa veṣṭayitvā dīpayitvā ca jvālayet tenāvisūtreṇa veṣṭite ca sūtraṃ saṃdahyate vārtākaś ca pacyate // UT_15.5
GR13uddamt_u:1120_0: ādipaṅktau sapta svarān saṃlikhya tadadhaḥpaṅktau kādisaptavargāt saṃlikhya tadadhaḥpaṅktau
GR13uddamt_u:1120_2: saṃjāyate bahuṣu madhyeṣu dattasaṃjñākṛtasaṃketaś cauraḥ svadṛṣṭim api saptasaptasvarādau
GR13uddamt_u:1121: vyāpāramadhye kṣaṇarasikaś cauro jñāyate kṛto bhadradravye // UT_15.6
GR13uddamt_u:1122: kutrāpi dhattūrakabījaṃ kṣiptvā tad vā bhakṣati tadā tadguṇādiphalaṃ labhyate asau cauraḥ iti /
GR13uddamt_u:1124_0: kṣīryarkādivṛkṣadugdhena saṃlikhitaṃ cauranāmākṣaraṃ karatale 'pi likhitam anantaraṃ
GR13uddamt_u:1124_1: bhūrjapattre kṛtam api mardane sparśayitvā bhakṣituṃ tato dadāti aparilikhitaṃ cauranāma
GR13uddamt_u:1126: jale sādhunāma pattrayuktamṛttikā ca jale majjati tataḥ spṛṣṭvā kriyate asau cauraḥ iti /
GR13uddamt_u:1129: varṇavaiparītyāt prativivardhitanyāsaḥ atidṛḍhā masī bhavati // UT_15.7
GR13uddamt_u:1130_0: nimbatālake samatāmrabhājane yāmamātramarditena vidhir astu samabhāgatā yathā āmalakīharītakīvibhītakanimbakhādirāṇām
GR13uddamt_u:1132: tiryaka bhūmau nārikelaphalam asthisahitaṃ mukhena karṇikāyām ekena prahāreṇa dvidhā bhavati
GR13uddamt_u:1134: guñjāphalāsthiliptaṃ stambhitaṃ taduttarapādaṃ prayojya prapadātyantaṃ bhramati tadā pādatale tālakāralagnā uttiṣṭhati /
GR13uddamt_u:1135: evaṃ laghukāṣṭhanirmitāsamakaḥ pāpapurahāsārthaṃ dattamukhaveṣṭaṃ kiṃcit yas tena sitavastrādau kaṭyāṃ lagnam upatiṣṭhamānās tiṣṭhati // UT_15.8
GR13uddamt_u:1136_0: evaṃ niviḍāmbarapihitajambādau adhomukhakāṃsyabhājananihitam aṅgāraṃ na dahati vastraṃ
GR13uddamt_u:1136_1: dahati cāpi śiśirajalamiśritam api ānataphalacūrṇabhāvitakalaśaḥ tīkṣṇaś ca kāṃsyabhājananihitaṃ
GR13uddamt_u:1136_2: guruḍḍanāpy aśaktaṃ na bhavati tadānīṃ tiktaṃ yāti yac chuktaṃ miṣṭam eti kajjalacavikācūrṇābhyāṃ
GR13uddamt_u:1136_3: kramasaṃlikhitapustakamadhyakāraṇe 'pi yatheṣṭayā pacyate yathā kaṭāhe ramyatare
GR13uddamt_u:1136_4: madhunāgniprajvalite sakuṇḍādau jalapūrṇe adhomukhe ujjvalaṃ svayam eti dhūmābhyāṃ
GR13uddamt_u:1136_5: svayam udgirati vartidvaye śaśaviṣṭhāpūrṇagarbhe kamaṭhair adhovartiviṣṭhāyitāpi
GR13uddamt_u:1136_6: upari jvalajjvālājvalitavartijvālām api jvalitadhūmam aṅgāratīkṣṇaśikhayā nāḍikādau /
GR13uddamt_u:1138: vāmakarāṅguliparyantaṃ gopitaṃ sūtracihnam apy acihnaṃ ca dṛśyate janasya viṣamasamākṣareṇa vīkṣite kālaḥ asamam api puruṣaṃ jānīyāt /
GR13uddamt_u:1139: pañcadāḍime śikhare masiguṇite yaddhi bhavati tāvat guṭike vijānīyāt /
GR13uddamt_u:1140: akālavakre sati kālam atha phalacūrṇena militvā bhasmanā saha ghṛtena kākañjikā sahasā bhavati agādhasthirajale dhūmacūrṇena likhitacintādi bhītavad bhāṣate na nimajjatīti /
GR13uddamt_u:1142: puṣyanakṣatre kuṅkumāvartitena bāṇena dūrastham api lakṣyaṃ bālo 'pi
GR13uddamt_u:1144: ṣaṇḍaṃ gomayānāṃ vartidīpakāntyā dagdhaṃ madhye hataśaśarudhiraṃ dṛśyate tatrāpi tailaṃ yat kiṃcid iti /
GR13uddamt_u:1145: śvetārkaphale tūlakaṃ sarṣapasamaṃ tailenaikīkṛtavartikadīpajvālāyāṃ gṛhoparivaṃśādidāru sarvaṃ sarpa iva dṛśyate /
GR13uddamt_u:1146: bhujagataile sacchidrabhāṇḍe bhujaṃgaṃ kṣiptvā acchidrabhāṇḍāntare vyavasthitam agnipātena jalaṃ jvalati /
GR13uddamt_u:1147: tadaiva tailaṃ pūrvaprakāreṇa kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ maṇḍūkatailāṅkitena sarvaṃ śātrava sarvaṃ bhavati
GR13uddamt_u:1148_0: dīpakāntyā dīpayitvā yat kiṃcic ca kukkuṭapakṣicañcvādividagdhanālalakṣitā satī hṛtā
GR13uddamt_u:1148_1: lekhā yadāyāti harikapālaṃ dhṛtvā bhavati tadā taj jalapūrṇāṃ ca kalaśaṃ riktakaṃ
GR13uddamt_u:1148_2: bhavati tathā maricaśuṇṭhī pippalīcūrṇenobhābhyāṃ vāmacaraṇatalaṃ liptvā tenāhato
GR13uddamt_u:1148_3: vṛkṣaḥ kalpavṛkṣaś ca nameruphalaṃ prasūyate // UT_15.11
GR13uddamt_u:1149_0: kṛṣṇā gauḥ prasavakāle tadvat samānavarṇaṃ jarāyur āgatatvena prajāreṇḍalā phalaṃ
GR13uddamt_u:1149_1: dṛṣṭvā muṣṭigṛhīte uccais tamasi phalaṃ prāyeṇa kṛtvā pradāsyati tathā kālāyitamudrikā
GR13uddamt_u:1149_2: varagostanī syād āpatitā gṛhītā nikṣiptā tu aṣṭau pūrvaphalāni janayati /
GR13uddamt_u:1150: samustāharitālamanaḥśilābhyāṃ navanītādiyogena kāritāñjane mayūrasya viṣṭhayā kṛtvā hastaṃ limpet tatra sthitaṃ dravyaṃ brahmāpi na paśyati /
GR13uddamt_u:1151: samukhaṃ phalacūrṇaṃ miśrodvartanakājale kṣiptvā krimisahasratulyaṃ dṛśyate /
GR13uddamt_u:1152: hayakālīyakasya śoṣitasya cūrṇaṃ gavaśīrṣakeṇa samudvartanena tātkālikaṃ sūkṣmajale niḥkṣipya sabījaṃ kṛṣir uccalati // UT_15.12
GR13uddamt_u:1154: japākusumodvartitāṅgaṃ churikādau kaṇācitaikakīṭakāphalākhyā yantrite rudhiravaj jaḍitaṃ kṣīrivṛkṣatvagavabhāvitā tailāktā vastravartir jalair jvalati /
GR13uddamt_u:1156: droṇakapuṣpādīni kṣudrapuṣpāṇi cūrṇāgre viniṣkṣipya dhattūrabījāni jalasiktāni sajīvavat phalanti
GR13uddamt_u:1157: ikṣuḥ kukkuṭībījacūrṇena sudarśanapattram iva tatkṣaṇāt jāyate /
